title: Temporary fix to unspecified error on mac client
body:
So I have seen many people have issues with mac client just as I have been. I have managed a temporary fix that worked for me and should work for you.
go to finder > applications > right click league of legends and click show package contents > contents > LoL > RADS > projects > lol_patcher > releases > 0.0.0.2 > deploy > LOLPATCHER

Open that up and it opens up the client but it redownloads the current patch (just wait it out) after its downloaded you can then play 

Hope this works for you guys

edit: I got as far as the champ select once it started loading the game instant bug splat and cant reconnect the game keeps crashing... fix didnt work :( 

Riot fix this

replies.body: Riot can u plz fix this problem
good +1 I was able to open to client, but can't login
